DtScriptedTaskMetaData.myDescription: Entity moves directly to the closest point on the nearest road, drives along the road to the point nearest the destination, then moves directly to the destination.

myVariables.item: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="9"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>destination</myVariableName> <myType>location</myType> <myLabel>Destination:</myLabel> <myToolTip></myToolTip> <myDefaultValue></myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData></myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>
